author: grepin
title: Nice car
review:
This set is a very decent one, but not impressive. It's somewhat small and I remember having a few mechanical problems with it despite having built it several times.
The aesthetics are nice, but the model looked much better with a set of larger wheels on the back. I used a pair from the 8456 with the ones from the 8414 on the front - all yellow looks better there :)

author: lt_dan
title: Compact and Versatile
review:
A small compact set that has various building elements:
a) 2 cylinders  - sophisticated ( i like any model with cylinders) always nice to have.
b) working steering - most models have them, but it makes the model much more active.
c) Cute front open space - nicely detailed.
d) Roll bar - makes it more "realistic" or sportive - the plastic pipes are unique.
e) 2 chairs - give you the ability to add 2 "medium" figures.
f) Pretty tough if it falls.
g) There aren't many parts so the construction isn't complicated. (good or not depends       on the builder)
